attributes.additional_details: We are working toward making a safer future for our most vulnerable. A future where they won't be judged for their quirky movements and obsessive nature, people need to be educated to understand there is so much more to these children than what they see on the outside. Children at a young age in primary school are taught sex education, why not teach them about something that affects 1 in 20 children and in all likelihood a child or two in their class.
